summary: This mod redecorates the interior and the exterior of Fort Frostmoth and makes it a player home
descriptionHtml:
[color=#3d85c6][size=5]
Introduction[/size][/color]
[size=3]This mod redecorates the interior and the exterior of Fort Frostmoth and turns it into a player home.
I have not edited any chests or items needed for any quests as far as I know BUT :
For the sake of the 8 Divines DO NOT install this mod unless you have finished the quest March of the Dead !!![/size]
[color=#3d85c6]
[size=5]About the mod[/size][/color][size=5]
[/size][color=#1155cc][size=5]Interior[/size][/color]
[size=3]-A cozy medium sized room
-A small bedroom
-Ashes have been removed
-Alchemy lab, workbench, grindstone, enchanting tables, a few beds, all containers are safe etc.
-A big library
[/size][size=3]-A secret necromancer room
[/size][size=5]
[color=#1155cc]Exterior[/color][/size]
[size=3]-A big ship at the docks[/size]

[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/72418-0-1451855244.jpg[/img]

[color=#3d85c6][size=5]Required[/size][/color]
[size=3]-This mod requires the Dragonborn DLC[/size]

[color=#3d85c6][size=5]Bugs[/size][/color][size=3]
-There is a small chance that any NPC that enters the Main Room will work at an invisible enchanting table ( no big deal )
[/size][color=#f4f4f4][size=3]-Please let me know if you find any other bugs[/size]
[size=4]
[/size][/color][size=4]Check out my other Mod - General Falx Carius Armor : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72388/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D72388%26preview%3D&pUp=]General Falx Carius Armor[/url]
[/size]


[b][size=5]                  [color=#674ea7]          [/color][/size][/b][b][color=#674ea7][size=6]d-_-b   by  Trifxn   d-_-b[/size][/color][/b]
author: trifxn
